item.description:
This meetup will be co-posted with Fun with Alcohol & Social Fun. Also Cambridge-somerville Live Music.
If a meetup lasting 9 hours is too long for you, join us at 6 PM:

The Fun with Alcohol group meets at Saccos pizza at 6:00 (43 Day St.), where we also regroup at their huge bar.

Join the mayhem.
Bewitching horns, music, & costume. Come along & see if you can stand still. The only Euro theme missing from this meetup is Lederhosen.
FREE. There will be "30 bands performing at 6 staging areas" in Davis Sq.

ORLEANS-- 3:30
HONK! FEST-- 4:15
WE REGROUP--SACCO'S, 6:00
HONK! FEST-- 6:45
WE RE-GROUP @THE BURREN-- 8:30

At Orleans, snatch a refreshment & introduce yourselves (With the bands it will be loud).

If you want to stay with the Meetup, look for Tigger the Tiger, a tall hat float with a Tigger Tiger puppet. After dark, you are encouraged to bring "DIY" lights such as bike lights.

There is no rain date. If it rains musicians will try to huddle in dry locations.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2daMVvOpdQ

Schedule:
http://honkfest.org/schedule/
HONK! fest ends at 9:00 PM.

We regroup again at The Burren on Elm St. at 8:30. I'll be there in the back room until 9:00. Beware, cover starts at 9:00.
OR option: The Rosebud Bar & lounge (381 summer St., 2 blocks away) which features two very impressive rock groups, cover starts (I think it's $7) at 8. 
Rosebud music starts at 9:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z9Hi4Z2dhe8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qg3BanTuvEc

Burren: at 10:30 join the band Red Square (Boston-based) for dancing.
http://redsquareboston.com/

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: HONK! 2012 Brass Bands & Dancing (Multi meetups)
